Name: Godslayer|one
About the game: Godslayer | one Godslayer | one is a small first-person single-player indie adventure game in which you look for unique and bizarre boss opponents. Usually one hit on the weak spot of your opponent is enough to defeat him, but be careful - they will be able to defeat you just as easily with one hit. Unique experience: You find yourself only armed with your bow in a mysterious world in which you have to face unique boss opponents. You will die a lot as you learn how to defeat your enemies, but once you know how, you will be able to finish each of them in only a few seconds. Replayablity: As soon as you have finished the game, you can start it again and try to minimize your deaths and defeat your bosses even faster!
